Name: Zen Chess: Champion's Moves
About the game: In Zen Chess: Champion's Moves you will be put in the position of a World Chess Champion. Play through historical games and solve the same chess problems the champions had to solve to win each game. Solve 150 chess puzzles , from historical games played by World Chess Champions; Chess puzzles goes from Mate-in-1 to Mate in-7 problems; For chess enthusiasts looking for perfect their game while enjoying a minimalist , beautifully designed chess board and pieces; Can you play like a champion?
